---
id: organization-service-generate-portal-link
title: "Generate Portal link"
description: "Generates a Admin Portal link. The Admin Portal will be used by the IT Admins to create and manage the SSO connection in their Org. The link generated via API will be valid for 1 week."
sidebar_label: "Generate Portal link"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "put api-method"
info_path: reference/scalekit-apis
custom_edit_url: null
---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Markdown from "@theme/Markdown";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Generate Portal link"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/v1/organizations/{id}/portal_links"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Generates a Admin Portal link. The Admin Portal will be used by the IT Admins to create and manage the SSO connection in their Org. The link generated via API will be valid for 1 week.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<details
  style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}
  className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
  data-collapsed={false}
  open={true}
>
  <summary
    style={{}}
  >
    <h3
      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}
    >
      Path Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary><div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"description":"Organization ID","name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details><div>
  <div>
    <ApiTabs
      label={undefined}
      id={undefined}
    >
      <TabItem
        label={"200"}
        value={"200"}
      >
        <div>
          
          
          Create Admin Portal Link
          
          
        </div><div>
          <MimeTabs
            className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}
            schemaType={"response"}
          >
            <TabItem
              label={"application/json"}
              value={"application/json"}
            >
              <SchemaTabs
                className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}
              >
                <TabItem
                  label={"Schema"}
                  value={"Schema"}
                >
                  <details
                    style={{}}
                    className={"openapi-markdown__details response"}
                    data-collapsed={false}
                    open={true}
                  >
                    <summary
                      style={{}}
                      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}
                    >
                      <strong>
                        Schema
                      </strong>
                    </summary><div
                      style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
                    >
                      
                    </div><ul
                      style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
                    >
                      <SchemaItem
                        collapsible={true}
                        className={"schemaItem"}
                      >
                        <details
                          style={{}}
                          className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
                        >
                          <summary
                            style={{}}
                          >
                            <span
                              className={"openapi-schema__container"}
                            >
                              <strong
                                className={"openapi-schema__property"}
                              >
                                link
                              </strong><span
                                className={"openapi-schema__name"}
                              >
                                 object
                              </span>
                            </span>
                          </summary><div
                            style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
                          >
                            <div
                              style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}
                            >
                              
                              
                              Admin Portal Link
                              
                              
                            </div><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"expire_time"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"date-time"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"description":"Expiry time of the link. The link is valid for 1 week.","type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2024-02-06T14:48:00.000Z"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"id"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"string"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"description":"Unique Identifier for the link","type":"string","example":"lnk_123123123123123"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"location"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"string"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"description":"Location of the link. This is the URL that can be used to access the Admin portal. The link is valid for 1 week.","type":"string","example":"https://scalekit.com/portal/lnk_123123123123123"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem>
                          </div>
                        </details>
                      </SchemaItem>
                    </ul>
                  </details>
                </TabItem><TabItem
                  label={"Example (from schema)"}
                  value={"Example (from schema)"}
                >
                  <ResponseSamples
                    responseExample={"{\n  \"link\": {\n    \"expire_time\": \"2024-02-06T14:48:00.000Z\",\n    \"id\": \"lnk_123123123123123\",\n    \"location\": \"https://scalekit.com/portal/lnk_123123123123123\"\n  }\n}"}
                    language={"json"}
                  >
                    
                  </ResponseSamples>
                </TabItem>
              </SchemaTabs>
            </TabItem>
          </MimeTabs>
        </div>
      </TabItem>
    </ApiTabs>
  </div>
</div>
